text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump We are still in the middle of the coronavirus millions of people are out of work can’t pay their rent don’t have enough food to eat for the families and you were not doing anything for them

domain.name: Person

domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court
